nodes.text: The Dameron Xtreme Cup was a race hosted on Castilon in 34 ABY. The race was made up a single round against Poe Dameron, and the pilot Kazuda Xiono would eventually win the race. Upon winning, Kazuda  received an X-wing.

The Dameron Xtreme Cup first appeared in the non-canonical video game Star Wars Resistance Racer. The game has the option to race as Kazuda Xiono or Tamara Ryvora. This article assumes Kazuda, who is the default choice, is correct.
